content: Weird how the C-CDA on FHIR extension update shows up under Lloyd's name when I was the one who pushed it.
Yes. Bug in the script Josh? Second one was mine and Rick's got grouped with it as being from the same person(no topic)
Poke for @Josh Mandel to check into the possible script error
Can you point me to what's wrong? Is it a bug in the notification or in the actual git repository history? Bug in git-svn seems unlikely...
Two commits happened in the same minute and we lump them and label with just one committer in the notification.
I'll call this a "known issue" for now.
